message: I propose dividing the money 7000$ for me and 3000$ for you. This ensures a fair share while considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I believe a 60/40 split is more fair considering the decreasing value of the money for you. This way we both benefit from a faster agreement.
Considering the decrease in the value of money, I propose a division of 6400$ for me and 3600$ for you. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for inflation.
